summary: Timeline_4 shows someone managing bipolar disorder with medication adjustments and therapeutic support.

posts.text: I feel so alone. I'm a burden to everyone Nobody understands what I'm going through. I hurt myself again Decided to join a support group. started going to therapy Met some people who actually get it. I'm being patient with myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I've been struggling with depression for weeks now. Everyone would be better off without me I've been having suicidal thoughts But yesterday I finally used my DBT skills and scheduled an appointment. I deserve to get better
maladaptive_evidence: Everyone would be better off without me
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Had a really bad day after weeks of progress. Everyone would be better off without me I don't care about anything anymore Using my coping skills instead of old habits. did some self-care activities This setback doesn't erase my progress. I'm committed to my recovery
maladaptive_evidence: Everyone would be better off without me
I don't care about anything anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thought I was getting better but I'm not. I'm worthless and pathetic Back to square one. I've been drinking to cope Reminded myself that recovery isn't linear. started going to therapy Reaching out for support instead of giving up. I'm learning to be kinder to myself
adaptive_evidence: I'm learning to be kinder to myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Can't even do basic tasks today. I'm broken beyond repair I can't get out of bed anymore Managed to shower and eat breakfast. reached out to my therapist Small steps are still steps forward. I'm learning to be kinder to myself
adaptive_evidence: I'm learning to be kinder to myself
maladaptive_evidence: I can't get out of bed anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Another day of feeling terrible. I hate myself so much I've been having suicidal thoughts Went outside for 10 minutes. took my medication as prescribed Called a friend. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: Recovery is a journey, not a destination
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The constant worry is exhausting. I want to give up on everything I can't focus on anything. I gave up trying My therapist recommended meditation so I asked for support and Taking it one day at a time
adaptive_evidence: Taking it one day at a time
maladaptive_evidence: I want to give up on everything
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Starting to see the light at the end of the tunnel. reached out to my therapist Therapy is really helping. I'm building a support system Still have rough days. I'm tired of existing But they're getting less frequent. I'm completely numb
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Three weeks without self-harming. practiced my coping strategies So proud of myself. I acknowledge my progress Almost slipped up. I feel empty inside But I reached out for help instead. I acknowledge my progress
posts.summary: Post shows active coping and progress despite challenges

posts.text: Work is overwhelming me. Nothing will ever get better I'm on the verge of a breakdown. I'm failing at everything Talked to my manager about reducing my workload. talked to a friend about what I'm going through Taking a mental health day tomorrow. I'm learning healthier coping skills
adaptive_evidence: talked to a friend about what I'm going through
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping
